thread.title: GST council clears draft compensation bill
thread.title_full: GST council clears draft compensation bill - The Economic Times

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: GST council clears draft compensation bill
text:
NEW DELHI: GST council today approved the draft compensation bill for states and government will table the bill in the next session of parliament . 

"Draft Compensation Bill has been approved in the GST Council meeting. The government will present the Bill to Parliament in next session," Finance Minister Arun Jaitley said after the GST council meeting today. 

"Next GST meeting will be held on March 4-5 in Delhi and government is expecting to clear the IGST and SGST bills in the meeting. It will also discuss slabs for commodities in next meeting," Jaitley said. 

"The GST council will then require one major meeting after March 4-5 to approve GST bill specifics," Jaitley added.
